title: Error Reporting
description: Demonstrate rich error reporting techniques including position-to-line/column conversion, context extraction, and formatted error messages.

motivation.why: Good error messages are critical for developer experience. Parser errors should clearly indicate what went wrong and where, with helpful context for debugging.

inputFormat.description: Any parseable input that demonstrates error conditions. Focus is on the error output quality, not the input format.

outputFormat.description: The parser produces detailed ParseErrorInfo with position, line/column, and surrounding context.

ParseErrorInfo.description: Struct with message, position, line, column, context

context.description: String showing surrounding lines with error highlighted
